short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check your clicks per second with the CPS test tool and set your world record.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CPS (clicks per second) is a tool where you can measure your clicks per second and set your record with the most clicks per second. In today's world, we are surrounded by technology, and many people like to play different kinds of games. CPS Test is a very popular tool, and it is very useful for gaming. You can practice for a click per second, and when you are professional at it, you can easily beat your opponent in gaming.
Many people use the spacebar counter in this tool. The space bar counter tool is also very useful for gaming. You can try out space bar clicker and CPS test tools and improve your gaming speed.
